DOC.brief_summary: Women age 18 45 need study look effect calcium supplementation bone health pregnancy black white woman . Study subject divide two group . Each group take 2 study supplement day , supplement calcium placebo ( pill without calcium ) . The study involve five visit Children 's Hospital Oakland Research Institute ; visit 1-2 hour length . There 3 study visit pregnancy 2 first year delivery . At visit blood drawn ask question eat type activity . At visit 16 36 week 4 12 month postpartum bone density measure . You pay $ 240 complete study .
